docs.text: AutoMarkDocs generate markdown docs from your python code automatically combine with python-markdown for deploying to github pages right away! files are imported and objects inspected, no source code parsing is done samples docs for ai_demos usage pip install pydoc-markdown cd /your/project git clone autmarkdocs python autmarkdocs/automarkdocs.py pydocmd build/serve/gh-deploy TODO package and doc how to use args maintain order in docs from which things are declared in files auto create table of contents at page starts
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Module automarkdocs.automarkdocs add_spaces def add_spaces(text, n=0) create_doc_folder def create_doc_folder(module, docs_path='docs') deep_docs def deep_docs(item) generate_docs def generate_docs(module) generate_module_tree def generate_module_tree(item) generate_pydocmd def generate_pydocmd(module, docs_path='/docs') get_classes def get_classes(item) get_comments def get_comments(item) get_markdown def get_markdown(module) get_methods def get_methods(item) get_module def get_module(module) get_routines def get_routines(item)
